pinyin: guang1 xue2 zi4 fu2 shi2 bie2

sentences.english: Changchun Light technology institute is China most early and most has the great reputation optics development facility.
sentences.chinese: 長春光機所是中國最早和最負盛名的光學研究機構。

sentences.english: Optical Imaging and Aberrations, Part II. Wave Diffraction Optics
sentences.chinese: 光學成像和失常，第二部分。波衍射光學

sentences.english: Optical Imaging and Aberrations, Part II. Wave Diffraction Optics
sentences.chinese: 光學成像和失常，第二部分。波衍射光學

sentences.english: If you believe Sony it's still the best camera even without OIS.
sentences.chinese: 如果你相信索尼儘管沒有光學防抖仍然是最好的相機。

sentences.english: But the scene is actually an optical illusion.
sentences.chinese: 而事實上，這樣的場景只是一種光學錯覺。

sentences.english: An optical method of pseudocolor equidensity encoding of photographic image is described. Frequency modulating of input image is made through!
sentences.chinese: 本文用光學方法實現了圖象等密度假彩色編碼。

sentences.english: Optical Localizer have the very high accuracy and reliability, but very expensive.
sentences.chinese: 光學立體定位儀精度高，可靠性強，但是價格昂貴。

sentences.english: A new configuration of an optical ring resonant cavity is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種新結構的光學環形諧振腔。

sentences.english: The basic principle of a detached type erasible and rewritable reinforced optic head is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了加固型可攝重寫分離式光學頭的基本工作原理。

sentences.english: A new optical system for infrared two-color detector was designed.
sentences.chinese: 設計了適於紅外雙色探測器的光學系統。

sentences.english: A method for determining both the optical constants and the thickness of thin films from transmission spectrum has been presented.
sentences.chinese: 給出了確定透明均勻薄膜光學常數和厚度的方法。

sentences.english: A four cone blackbody cavity was obtained by simulating the blackbody with geometric-optical method.
sentences.chinese: 用幾何光學方法模擬黑體，得一四錐黑體腔。

sentences.english: It is transformed into visible light image through optical correlator.
sentences.chinese: 它通過光學相關器轉換成可見光圖像信息。

sentences.english: Cane probes utilize modern, instant-on optic principles.
sentences.chinese: 杆式探頭採用現代的即時啓動光學原理。

sentences.english: Optical lift is different from the aerodynamic lift created by an airfoil.
sentences.chinese: 光學提拉力與機翼翼面產生的空氣動力不同。

sentences.english: Nonlinear optical(NLO) materials will play a key role in future optical communication.
sentences.chinese: 非線性光學材料是未來光通訊的關鍵材料。

definition: to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
